product_name: CliniqueMoisture Surge Eye 96-Hour Hydro Filler Concentrate
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Moisture Surge Eye Concentrate is an ultralight, cushiony water-gel that delivers intense, crease-plumping hydration.
details: DetailsBenefitsAll Skin Types.Instantly re-floods, tightens, and brightens skin.Hydrates delicate eye area for 96 hours of moisture using Auto-Replenishing Lipid-Sphere Technology with pure aloe butter.Helps rebuild skin's lipid barrier to minimize moisture loss.Encapsulated antioxidants help break the cycle of environmental stress that can lead to premature aging.Dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested.Safe for contact lens wearers.Non-acnegenic.Allergy tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesFragranceItem 2544071How To UseUse pea-size amount of eye treatment. Massage gel all around eye area. Can be used alone, under makeup, or as a 3-minute eye mask.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Propanediol, Phenyl Trimethicone, Sucrose, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Hypnea Musciformis (Algae) Extract, Trehalose, Algae Extract, Alteromonas Ferment Extract, Acetyl Glucosamine, Gelidiella Acerosa Extract, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Water, Sorbitol, Cholesterol, Niacinamide, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Sodium Polyaspartate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Hydrolyzed Rice Extract, Caffeine, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Tocopheryl Acetate, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Palmitoyl Hexapeptide-12, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Glyceryl Polymethacrylate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, PEG-7m, Dextrin Palmitate, Dehydroxanthan Gum, Sodium Hyaluronate, Pentaerythrityl Adipate/Caprate/Caprylate/Heptanoate, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Carbomer, PEG-8, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Disodium EDTA, Sodium Citrate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, BHT, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin, Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Iron Oxides (CI 77491).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use pea-size amount of eye treatment. Massage gel all around eye area. Can be used alone, under makeup, or as a 3-minute eye mask.

reviews.headline: Clinique Hydro Filler
reviews.comments: Just started using. A little tingly after few minutes so working . I does make my crepe-y above the eye skin look better. Adds moisture so not so dry. That's where I've been using it .

reviews.headline: I'm impressed
reviews.comments: I used this product when it first came out and it has definitely changed, now I think it's better. I use a little less than half a pump. I then wait for it to soak in a few seconds, probably 20, then I layer the smart eye cream over it. So far I'm liking the results. My eyes look much more hydrated And much less saggy.

reviews.headline: Luv the Product
reviews.comments: I'm sold with this product!  Truly lives up to its ad.

reviews.headline: Easily Absorbed
reviews.comments: Great product. It's not sticky or gooey and absorbs quickly. Makes the eyes feel great!

reviews.headline: Clinique Eye Gel
reviews.comments: It is so sticky! It makes underneath my eyes greasy. I would not recommend purchasing.

reviews.headline: waste of money
reviews.comments: the other one for face better than this i didn't see any big deal to buy it so dispointed not again

reviews.headline: It's Fine
reviews.comments: The product itself is fine. It's cooling and somewhat hydrating. That being said, the pump is a huge pain. It's inconsistent when you depress it, sometimes nothing comes out, sometimes an entire pump's worth pf product. For the price and the amount of product, it's not worth it in my opinion. I'll use it until it's out but wont buy again.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I love this gel! It applies easily and smoothly and makes my eyes feel so much better, especially in the morning!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: I feel this product really works wonders for its intended use.

reviews.headline: THE BOMB
reviews.comments: I have very sensitive skin around my eyes, I love ‚ù§Ô∏è this 57 and this works great!!!

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I don't know why this product doesn't have more 5 star reviews. I love it. Like most face products, it took me about a week of using it to really see results. It really hydrates around my eyes so much better than any other product I've found and it works well to layer on top of. I also have super sensitive skin and this doesn't irritate at all. I have quickly become dependent on this product in my skincare routine.

reviews.headline: meh at best
reviews.comments:
I have been using this for a while now, used about half of it. It adds a small amount of moisture that goes away after an hour or two. It is also very sticky on the skin for an hour. 
The pump gets clogged too easy with the small pilled droplets in it. Nothing will come out, so have to pump it multiple times then way too much comes out and it's wasted because you cannot put any back. 
Very disappointing as this is too expensive for the terrible packaging. Would be better in a squeeze tube or something you can put it back into if you get too much out.

reviews.headline: ORDINARY
reviews.comments: A slight hydration of the eye area but definetely not what the rep said I would get. Disappointed.

reviews.headline: Great eye gel!
reviews.comments: I've been using this eye gel for 4 months now, it really helps with fine lines/wrinkles and tired eyes as well, my only complaint is the gel beads sometimes get stuck but other than that excellent product!

reviews.headline: Not worth the money, and I generally love Clinique
reviews.comments: I am not really sure how this product is doing but I do know they need to think about repackaging it. The little pearls can not even come out the opening and get stuck causing the product to build up. Then it comes out in a glob which gets wasted. Clinique you can do better.

reviews.headline: Waste of money.
reviews.comments: This did nothing. I see no difference. I've used morning and night consistently for the last 2 weeks. No difference.

reviews.headline: I noticed a difference right away
reviews.comments: Ashley in Clinique at the Commack, NY store recommended this to me and I love it. I noticed a difference right away.

reviews.headline: Love the product, the packaging is a pain.
reviews.comments: If I don't use eye cream in the winter, I get eczema around my eyes. This product does an excellent job at keeping the skin around my eyes hydrated, protected, and just looking better overall. If I skip a day or two I really notice. The only drawback is that the packaging is a real pain to deal with. The dispenser does not want to dispense, and when it does, random amounts of product come out. I'm on my 4th or 5th tube and they are all the same way (this tells you how good the product is, that I've stuck with it for this long). I store the tube upside down and it works well most of the time. I might try some other products soon because I'm so tired of struggling with the dispenser.

reviews.headline: My under eye treatment
reviews.comments: I love my under-eye treatment. Clinique is great!

reviews.headline: Burning and irritating to sensitive skin around eyes.
reviews.comments: I will be returning this product as it has caused me discomfort. I believe that Ulta stands behind its products. And I appreciate that!

faceoff_positive.comments: Since I've fallen in love with all the moisture surge products I just had to go to my Clinique store to check this eye gel out, I'm delighted to say wow! Thanks to the store manager she taught me how to place the pea size amount on my finger, and gently rub the product to "break the capsules" required to get the eye gel to work with the full effects, this is important, I tried it anf fell in love with it, I purchased and started using it immediately and my eyes were brighter, you can feel it working like a gentle tightening, and my favorite part, it is totally non irritating, I gently put under my eyes near the corners, and a bit on the lids, the next morning I felt my skin around my eyes and the moistureizing effect is huge! I still use my Clinique All About Eyes for puffiness and use this a couple times a week as it lasts so long on your skin, even after that morning face wash they are still hydrated, one pump gives that pea sized amount so the product goes a long way, and will last a long time. The texture of this eye gel is unbelievable it's so silky and yet you almost feel the aloe butter working around your eye area. I would recommend for everyone especially for women who don't sleep well, (like myself) and for anyone looking to brighten the eye area especially under eye makeup it truly is the only eye gel I've actually felt and see it working! Thank you Clinique for an excellent product and another favorite moisture surge product, nothing compares!üòçüòä
faceoff_positive.headline: It brightens! And tightens!

faceoff_negative.comments: I am always on the hunt for a good eye cream but this unfortunately isn't it. I make every effort to buy cruelty-free but was gifted a tube of this eye cream. So Clinique is not cruelty-free. My second point of issue is cost. If this eye cream was super hydrating and long-lasting, cost wouldn't concern me but I think this is one of the worst eye creams I've tried all year and at the highest price point at that. I personally don't like the bursting beads in beauty products but the beads aside, the formula of this is thin, slippery, and doesn't feel like it absorbs well. I tried with and without product under this eye gel but neither approach seems to help it absorb. I've tried water gels that absorb into the skin well and hold moisture all day but didn't have the same experience with this product. If you like a thin eye gel, this might be a good fit, but if you're a cream hydrator fan, keep looking!
faceoff_negative.headline: Just Meh

rollup.name: Moisture Surge Eye 96-Hour Hydro Filler Concentrate
